name: Balloon-Scape
description:
DESCRIPTION

Explore a vast, 2D open world, packed with all sorts of unique locations, enemies, and items to collect. Play as a stocky, adventures wizard, scouring across the land, desperately in search of the 4 keys to a getaway-hot air balloon that will let him escape the planet before its fated destruction.

DEFULT CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS: MOVE

Z: ATTACK/INTERACT

ENTER: OPEN/CLOSE MENU

SPACE: RECOVER

UNLOCKABLE ITEMS:

X: SHURIKEN

C: BLAST

Shift: SHEILD

WASD CONTROLS (toggleable in menu)

WASD: MOVE

P: ATTACK/INTERACT

ENTER: OPEN/CLOSE MENU

SPACE: RECOVER

UNLOCKABLE ITEMS:

O: SHURIKEN

I: BLAST

[ : SHIELD

How to Beat the Game

To beat the game, you must find 4 different hot air balloons, and retrieve the key from each of them. Once you have obtained all 4 keys, you may head to the top of the map, go into the golden hot air balloon, and officially complete the game.

Health meter

In the top-left corner of the screen, there is a meter. If the meter is shaking and you press space bar, you recover a heart. The meter is also tied to certain item, namely the blast and shuriken, which are used at the expense of juice in your meter. The meter is filled up by hitting enemies.
